source_data.description: Backend Development course , in this course we will learn about the fundamental concepts and practices of backend development. From setting up the backend environment to handling HTTP requests, implementing RESTful APIs, and managing databases, you'll gain a comprehensive understanding of building robust server-side applications. Through practical examples and hands-on projects, you'll develop the skills needed to implement user authentication, session management, error handling, and more. By the end, you'll be proficient in developing scalable and secure backend solutions to power various web and mobile applications.
